title.rendered: Ebook Driving Liquidity in Private Markets

content.rendered:
Ebook download

Driving Liquidity in Private Markets

Private markets are booming. Over the past decade capital allocation to private markets has almost doubled. Yet, despite this significant growth, the lack of infrastructure in this industry has resulted in an industry with poor asset and price discovery and ultimately low liquidity levels for investors.

In this paper, Tokeny Solutions and PwC Luxembourg propose to leverage the attributes of blockchain in terms of global reach, automation, and asset transferability among others to overcome many of the challenges faced today by industry participants.

[vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html]

Download the ebook to discover:

  • The state of play in private markets
  • Challenges and opportunities for the industry
  • Blockchain as a solution
  • A hypothetical use case
